bulkEvaluation.forceAIDescription: Skip heuristics and use AI for all translations (higher cost)
bulkEvaluation.title: Evaluate Translation Quality
bulkEvaluation.descriptionAll: Evaluate quality for all translations in this branch
bulkEvaluation.infoAI: AI evaluation for complex quality issues

empty.title: Aún no hay proyectos
empty.description: Crea tu primer proyecto para comenzar a gestionar traducciones con control de versiones y colaboración.

ai.title: AI Evaluation
ai.description: Use AI to evaluate translation quality (accuracy, fluency, terminology)
ai.enabledDescription: Use AI to evaluate complex quality issues
ai.modelDescription: Specific model to use for evaluation

aiProviderLink.title: Configuración del proveedor de IA
aiProviderLink.description: Configure qué proveedor de IA usar para la evaluación de calidad

triggers.afterAIDescription: Automatically score translations created by AI
triggers.beforeMergeDescription: Require quality check before merging branches

thresholds.title: Quality Thresholds
thresholds.autoApproveDescription: Automatically approve translations with score ≥ this value
thresholds.flagDescription: Flag translations with score < this value for review

welcome.title: Bienvenido a Lingx
welcome.description: Gestión profesional de traducciones con control de versiones tipo Git para equipos modernos

step1.title: Crear un proyecto
step1.description: Define tus idiomas de origen y destino

step3.title: Sincroniza con tu app
step3.description: Usa CLI o API para obtener traducciones

dashboard.overview: Aquí está tu resumen de traducciones

createProject.title: Crear nuevo proyecto
createProject.description: Inicia un proyecto de localización con control de versiones, ramificación y colaboración en equipo

guide.title: Welcome to the Workbench
guide.description: Let's take a quick tour of the translation editor

sidebar.title: Key List Sidebar
sidebar.description: Browse and select translation keys from your project

features.browse: Browse all translation keys with instant search
features.selection: Click to select a key, or use checkboxes for multi-select
features.statusDots: Colored dots show translation status (missing, pending, approved)
features.qualityMeter: Quality score bars indicate translation confidence

sidebar.proTip: Use arrow keys for lightning-fast navigation through your translation keys

editor.title: Key Editor Panel
editor.description: Edit the source text and manage key properties

features.sourceEdit: Edit the source (default language) text directly
features.autoSave: Changes are auto-saved as you type - no save button needed
features.icuSupport: Full ICU MessageFormat support with syntax highlighting

editor.proTip: ICU syntax like {count, plural, one {# item} other {# items}} is auto-highlighted

languages.title: Language Rows
languages.description: View and edit translations for each target language

features.expand: Click a language row to expand and edit the translation
features.edit: Type directly in the textarea to update translations
features.status: Each row shows approval status and quality indicators

languages.proTip: Press Tab to quickly move between language fields when editing

shortcuts.title: Quick Actions & Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Speed up your workflow with keyboard shortcuts

features.mtTranslate: Cmd/Ctrl + M: Machine translate the focused translation
features.aiTranslate: Cmd/Ctrl + I: AI translate with context awareness
features.approve: Cmd/Ctrl + Enter: Approve the current translation
features.reject: Cmd/Ctrl + Backspace: Reject and clear the translation
features.navigation: Arrow keys: Navigate between keys and languages

shortcuts.proTip: Master these shortcuts and you'll translate 10x faster than using the mouse

dock.title: Bottom Dock

features.tm: TM Matches: See similar translations from your Translation Memory
features.glossary: Glossary: View approved terminology for consistency
features.ai: AI Suggestions: Get context-aware translation suggestions
features.related: Related Keys: Find keys with similar content
features.tmDescription: Reuse approved translations from your project history
features.aiDescription: Context-aware suggestions based on surrounding text
features.relatedDescription: Find similar keys to maintain consistency

dock.proTip: Click a suggestion to instantly apply it to your translation

batch.title: Batch Operations
batch.description: Perform actions on multiple keys at once

features.select: Use checkboxes to select multiple keys
features.actions: A floating bar appears with batch actions
features.translate: Translate, approve, or delete multiple items at once

batch.proTip: Perfect for translating an entire feature or section at once

filters.title: Filters & Search
filters.description: Quickly find the keys you need to work on

features.status: Filter by status: Missing, Complete, Pending, Approved
features.quality: Filter by quality score to find items needing review
features.namespace: Filter by namespace to focus on specific areas

filters.proTip: Filter by 'Missing' to focus on untranslated keys
